Usage:
  policy logs [flags]

Examples:
policy logs  --owner-id 462d67f8-b232-4da4-a7de-0c86dd667d3f --offset 42

Flags:
      --branch string       filter decision logs based on branch name
      --end string          filter decision logs based on end time
      --offset int          specifies the number of logs to skip
      --project-id string   filter decision logs based on project-id
      --start string        filter decision logs based on start time

Global Flags:
      --owner-id string          the id of the owner of a policy
      --policy-base-url string   base url for policy api (default "https://internal.circleci.com")
